name: 1strbas
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: strfv(c0, c1, cbs, c2, cop(nat1, nat1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wbr(c2, cstr, cop(nat1, nat1))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(cfv(cbs, cnx)))
-| wss(csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)), c2)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 =(Base ` c2))
⊣ c2[Struct]< 1, 1 >
⊣ Base = Slot((Base ` ndx))
⊣ { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > } ⊆ c2

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wbr(c2, cstr, cop(nat1, nat1))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(cfv(cbs, cnx)))
-| wss(csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)), c2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 =(Base ` c2))
⊣ c2[Struct]< 1, 1 >
⊣ Base = Slot((Base ` ndx))
⊣ { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > } ⊆ c2

body.origin:
|- wbr(c2, cstr, cop(nat1, nat1))
-| wceq(c2, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(cfv(cbs, cnx)))
-| wss(csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)), c2)
-| wceq(c2, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 =(Base ` c2))
⊣ Base = Slot((Base ` ndx))
⊣ { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > } ⊆ c2
⊣ c2 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > }

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wss(csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)), c2)
-| wceq(c2, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))

body.origin:
|- wss(csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)), c2)
-| wceq(c2, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > } ⊆ c2
⊣ c2 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > }

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 =(Base ` c2))
⊣ c2 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > }

comment: The base set of a constructed one-slot structure. (Contributed by AV, 27-Mar-2020.)
